remarks:
The union of the empty set is the empty set.  Theorem 8.7 of [Quine] p. 54.  (Reproved without relying on ~ ax-nul by Eric Schmidt.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-1993.)  (Revised by Eric Schmidt, 4-Apr-2007.)
